mapper.sql: I.IdentityID, I.Name, I.IDNumber, I.Mobile, I.BankNumber, I.HouseNumber, I.HouseAddress, I.HouseArea, I.HouseOwnerUserName, I.HouseOwnerIDNumber, I.IsMatch, I.MateID, I.DataSource, I.Remarks, I.UpdateTime, I.UpdateUserID, I.CreateTime, I.CreateUserID, I.IsDelete, I.Version
mapper.select: select U.UserID, U.LoginID, '' as password, U.UserName, U.Mobile, U.Email, U.Sex, U.Birthday, U.WeixinID, U.PhotoURL, U.IsSilent, U.IsDisable, U.UserType, U.Level, U.Points, U.Experience, U.Remarks, U.UpdateTime, U.UpdateUserID, U.CreateTime, U.CreateUserID, U.IsDelete, U.Version from security_user U where UserID = #{createUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(I.IdentityID) from credit_identity I where I.IsDelete = 0 and I.MateID <> 0
and I.Name like "%${name}%"
and I.IDNumber like "%${idNumber}%"
and I.Mobile like "%${mobile}%"

select
from credit_identity I where I.IsDelete = 0 and I.MateID <> 0
and I.Name like "%${name}%"
and I.IDNumber like "%${idNumber}%"
and I.Mobile like "%${mobile}%"
order by ${page.sortField} ${page.sortType} limit ${page.start}, ${page.pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into credit_identity
IdentityID,
Name,
IDNumber,
Mobile,
BankNumber,
HouseNumber,
HouseAddress,
HouseArea,
HouseOwnerUserName,
HouseOwnerIDNumber,
IsMatch,
MateID,
DataSource,
Remarks,
UpdateTime,
UpdateUserID,
CreateTime,
CreateUserID,
IsDelete,
Version,

mapper.update:
update credit_identity
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDNumber = #{IDNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BankNumber = #{bankNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HouseNumber = #{houseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsMatch = #{isMatch,jdbcType=BIT},
MateID = #{mateID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateUserID = #{updateUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateUserID = #{createUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsDelete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
Version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where IdentityID = #{identityID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update credit_identity set Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDNumber = #{IDNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BankNumber = #{bankNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HouseNumber = #{houseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsMatch = #{isMatch,jdbcType=BIT}, MateID = #{mateID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateUserID = #{updateUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateUserID = #{createUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IsDelete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, Version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where IdentityID = #{identityID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
